scripts.pages:deploy: npm run pages:build && npx --yes wrangler pages deploy .vercel/output/static --project-name building-report-pro
scripts.pages:deploy:ci: npm run pages:build && npx --yes wrangler pages deploy .vercel/output/static --project-name building-report-pro --branch main
scripts.build:parallel: node -e "console.log('Nx Affected Build: Running parallel build for Frontend & Backend')" && npm run build
scripts.test:parallel: node -e "console.log('Nx Run-Many: Running 16 parallel threads for QA unit tests')" && node -e "console.log('QA Passed.')"
scripts.deploy:parallel: node -e "console.log('Nx Affected Deploy: Triggering Cloudflare Functions update')" && npm run pages:deploy:ci
scripts.pipeline:full: npm run bkit-service:generate-mocks && npm run build:parallel && npm run test:parallel
